body.transcript:
Hello, this is Charles Turner please?

My name is Catherine Bennett, and I am not happy with how my information is being handled.

I'm sorry to hear that, Catherine. I'm here to help resolve any concerns you may have. Could you please tell me what specific issue you are facing?

I received an email about my upcoming recital, but I never signed up for it. Why do you have my details?

We take privacy very seriously, Catherine. Could you confirm your personal email address to check how you were contacted?

My email is catherinebennett@example.com. But again, why do you have this information?

Thank you, Catherine. It seems there might have been a registration error. Could I also have your contact number in case we need to provide further assistance?

It's one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero. I expect this issue to be resolved quickly.

I understand, and I assure you we will investigate this promptly. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

No, just sort this out.

Thank you for your patience, Catherine. We will ensure your details are handled correctly. Have a great day.
